.. currentmodule:: wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers

.. highlight:: python



.. _wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.MenuBarHandler:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.agw.persist.persist_handlers.MenuBarHandler**
==========================================================================================================================================

Supports saving/restoring the :class:`wx.MenuBar` and :class:`lib.agw.flatmenu.FlatMenuBar` items state.

This class handles the following wxPython widgets:

- :class:`wx.MenuBar`;
- :class:`lib.agw.flatmenu.FlatMenuBar`.



|

|api| Class API
===============


.. class:: MenuBarHandler(AbstractHandler)

   Supports saving/restoring the :class:`wx.MenuBar` and :class:`lib.agw.flatmenu.FlatMenuBar` items state.
   
   This class handles the following wxPython widgets:
   
   - :class:`wx.MenuBar`;
   - :class:`lib.agw.flatmenu.FlatMenuBar`.

   .. method:: GetKind(self)
